USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

--Query fr0m folders using wildcard characters
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK '/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS [RESULT]

--Get filename
SELECT TOP 100 
Result.filename() as 'filename',
Result.*
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK '/trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) AS [RESULT]

--Query from sub folders with filepath
SELECT TOP 100
    Result.filepath() as 'file_path',
    Result.*
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) as [Result] 


--use filepath to target partitions
SELECT 
    Result.filepath(1) as 'Year',
    Result.filepath(2) as 'Month',
    Count(1) as record_count
FROM
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
) as [Result] 
WHERE Result.filepath(1) ='2020'
AND Result.filepath(2) in ('06','07','08')
GROUP BY Result.filepath(1), Result.filepath(2)
ORDER BY Result.filepath(1), Result.filepath(2)
